description:
Fast, small and compact freeware PSD viewer

PSD Viewer is fast, small and compact freeware image viewer supported by all versions of Windows. With this viewer you can easily convert and save opened image in other file formats as JPEG, Bitmap, GIF, PNG and other extensions. Dispute converting in other file formats, PSD Viewer supports resizing of PSD images, enlarge or reduce, without losing any quality.
PSD Viewer have a very user-friendly interface, so any user, no matter if is beginner or advance can use it without a problem and can open, zoom, rotate, resize, convert and save .psd images to other formats.
